items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pleasantly surprised!
items.body: I’m 5’1”, a solid size 12, with a small gut. This dress fit perfectly, like a glove! The cut is very flattering (and forgiving.) It is a tad bit long on me, as expected, but a pair of heels will fix that. I’m very impressed with the quality and overall appearance of this dress. (Plus, there’s no weird “chemical” smell as there is on some other garments I purchase through Amazon.) I can hardly wait to wear this stunning dress and will be back soon to order another in a different color! Read more
items.author: SDMama36

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars LOVE this dress!
items.body: Needed a dress for my nephew's formal wedding. I ordered many dresses and returned them. I was just about to give up, until this dress arrived. It fit perfectly except that it was a few inches too long- it required a simple hem. The dress was very comfortable as well. It was not too low cut- I didn't have to worry about my bra straps showing or have to keep constantly adjusting anything. The slit in the leg was cut so that I could sit easily without showing too much skin. This dress hit the sweet spot of being appropriate for a church wedding, with glamour, class and a bit of sex appeal. Perfect dress for a formal wedding. Highly recommend! Read more
items.author: Customer Penny

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice quality & really pretty
items.body: Really pretty, flattering style. Does run a little small Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars NICE!!
items.body: Fits perfectly! I was looking for a formal dress for a special occasion and decided to get this. It came quickly and is well made- good, quality material- which surprised me. If you have a coke-bottle shape as I do, it will make you proud! Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Baggy on top
items.body: The color was beautiful. From the waist down the dress fit well. The top was a little too baggy for me. I’m 5’4 about 155. Read more
items.author: Brittany

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful Dress, but Not For Me
items.body: I loved so much about this dress (the color, the length, the cut), but returned it because it wasn't quite right for my build. I'm 5'5", 135 lbs. It looked good from the waist down despite my narrow hips, but up top I'm a 36-38 D and I looked way too "top heavy" in it, despite it being an attractive, yet modest cut. I almost kept it, but in the end, it just wasn't right for me. The material is comfortable, stretchy, and good quality. Read more
items.author: A. Truslow

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gorgeous dress!
items.body: This is an absolutely gorgeous dress…I ordered 5 dresses for a very special event…I loved them all and a size small was perfect…in this one dress I thought maybe I needed a medium..I received the medium and tried it on…wow. I loved it! My hubby did too! Don’t hesitate to order this beautiful dress. You won’t be disappointed!!! Read more
items.author: Donna R Hurlbut-Ost

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good Quality
items.body: Perfect fit. Good quality. Very flattering. Read more
items.author: Russell T.

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Mermaid Evening is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Mermaid Evening is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Dark Green, Purple, Black, Navy Blue. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
